title: Aspripetra
description: A cavernous grotto on the island of Kos that seems to have served as a place of worship in ancient times. Pan and the Nymphs were venerated there in Archaic Greek times. The grotto's ancient name is unknown.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates after Levi, PECS.
properties.title: Aspri Petra Cave Entrance
